message: The REC_USE_LIM field for indicator 8-5-1, translated into all languages

data.en: The variety of possible sources for statistics on earnings greatly hinders international comparability, as each type of source has its own coverage, scope, and characteristics. It would not be fully accurate to compare, for example, hourly earnings from a labour force survey for one country with hourly earnings from an establishment survey for another. The use of non-standard definitions and the heterogeneity of operational criteria applied further hamper cross-country comparisons.
